name: Do you provide an opportunity for an internship?
description:
Yes, we provide such an opportunity.
 Opportunity to practice abroad within the framework of the Erasmus + project at the enterprises of partner schools or partner enterprises. 
 At various metalworking and construction companies both in Ida-Virumaa (Fortaco Estonia OÜ, Eesti Energia AS, Hanza Mechanics Narva AS, Norwes Metall AS) and Estonia.

name: Will there be an opportunity for further education?
description:
There will be opportunities for training in the following areas:
 Related professions (fitter, welder, mechatronics, 
CNC machine tool operator), vocational training CNC machine tool operator, advanced training (level 5).

name: What institutions of higher education can I enroll after graduation?
description:
Tallinna Tehnikaülikool (TalTech): Masinaehitus- ja energiatehnoloogia protsesside juhtimine (Virumaa)
 Tallinna Tehnikakõrgkool: Masinaehitus, Robotitehnika.

name: What are the possible jobs?
description: A welder, fitter or CNC machine tool operator can find a suitable job in mechanical engineering, machine tool building, metallurgy, automotive and shipbuilding.
